meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>slow</kanji> <kanji>bloom</kanji> is a bloom that happens late. It's a <vocabulary>late flower</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>late blooming</vocabulary>. Important to know if you're going to go do 花見.
readingMnemonic: The reading is 遅い and 咲く put together (the same reading you learned from the 咲 kanji). Watch out for the rendaku.
